subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Commenting on his 2014 suspension for the first time, Alex Rodriguez told reporters in Mexico City that “2014 will be a good year to rest physically, mentally and to prepare for the future.”
snippet: Commenting on his 2014 suspension for the first time, Alex Rodriguez told reporters in Mexico City that “2014 will be a good year to rest physically, mentally and to prepare for the future.”
